prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a slimy body and a playful expression.
Imagine a Pokemon with a pink and brown color scheme that thrives in wetlands.
Generate a creature resembling a slug, with unique features like waves on its back.
Show me a Pokemon that lives in forests, characterized by its vibrant colors and soothing demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that has a soft, squishy appearance, perfect for kids to love.
Design a dual-type Pokemon that has a distinct aquatic and earthy vibe.
Give me a Pokemon that is known for its friendly personality and adaptability to different environments.
